original_text: You never leave us alone. You test us every moment of every day. You never leave us alone. You test us every moment of every day. You never leave us alone.

sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 결코 우리를 홀로 두지 않으십니다

sentences.original_text: You test us every moment of every day
